name: Assert
desc:
A utility class that provides static assertion methods for validating
arguments and states in your application.

name: doesNotContain
desc: Asserts that the given textToSearch does not contain the given substring.

name: hasLength
desc: Asserts that the given text is not null and not empty.

name: hasText
desc: Asserts that the given text contains non-whitespace characters.

name: isInstanceOf
desc: Asserts that the given obj is an instance of type T.

name: isTrue
desc: Asserts that a boolean expression is true.

name: notEmpty
desc: Asserts that the given list is not null and not empty.

name: notEmptyMap
desc: Asserts that the given map is not null and not empty.

name: state
desc: Asserts that a boolean expression is true.

name: AssetLoader
desc: A configurable asset bundler for loading files from Dart packages.

name: AssetLoader.forJetLeaf
desc: Creates a new asset bundler specifically for the JetLeaf package.

name: AssetLoader.forPackage
desc: Creates a new asset bundler for the specified package.

name: clearCache
desc: Clears the internal cache.

name: exists
desc: Checks if an asset exists without loading it.

name: getPackageRoot
desc: Gets the package root path for debugging purposes.

name: load
desc: Loads an asset from the configured package as a string.

name: packageName
desc: Gets the configured package name.

name: AssetLoaderException
desc: An exception thrown when an asset cannot be loaded by the JetLeaf bundler.

name: AssetLoaderException.new
desc: An exception thrown when an asset cannot be loaded by the JetLeaf bundler.

name: assetPath
desc: The full path to the asset that could not be loaded.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toString
desc:
Returns a human-readable string representation of the exception,
including the asset path and the underlying cause, if present.

name: AssetLoaderInterface
desc: Abstract interface for asset bundling operations.

name: clearCache
desc: Clears the internal cache.

name: exists
desc: Checks if an asset exists without loading it.

name: getPackageRoot
desc: Gets the package root path for debugging purposes.

name: load
desc: Loads an asset from the configured package as a string.

name: packageName
desc: Gets the configured package name.

name: AssetLoaderManager
desc: Core manager class that handles all asset bundling logic.

name: AssetLoaderManager.new
desc: Creates a new bundler manager for the specified package.

name: assetExists
desc: Checks if an asset exists in the package.

name: clearCache
desc: Clears the internal cache.

name: getPackageRoot
desc: Gets the package root path.

name: loadAsset
desc: Loads an asset from the package using multiple resolution strategies.

name: packageName
desc: Gets the configured package name.

name: NestedPlaceholderPart
desc: A PlaceholderPart that represents a nested placeholder expression with optional fallback.

name: NestedPlaceholderPart.new
desc: A PlaceholderPart that represents a nested placeholder expression with optional fallback.

name: defaultParts
desc: The optional parts that make up the default/fallback value of the placeholder.

name: keyParts
desc: The parts that make up the dynamic key of the placeholder.

name: resolve
desc: Represents a segment or fragment of a placeholder expression.

name: PackageUtils
desc: Utility class for resolving and caching Dart packages at runtime.

name: getPackage
desc: Utility class for resolving and caching Dart packages at runtime.

name: Parser
desc: A base interface for all configuration parsers in Jetleaf.

name: parse
desc: Parses the given source string into a Map<String, dynamic>.

name: parseAs
desc: Parses the given Asset and returns it as a generic Object.

name: parseAsset
desc: Parses a Jetleaf Asset into a Map<String, dynamic>.

name: parseFile
desc: Optionally parses configuration directly from a file located at path.

name: ParserException
desc: Exception thrown when parsing fails.

name: ParserException.new
desc: Exception thrown when parsing fails.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: PlaceholderAbstractPart
desc:
Base class for all PlaceholderPart implementations that represent a segment
of a parsed placeholder expression.

name: PlaceholderAbstractPart.new
desc:
Base class for all PlaceholderPart implementations that represent a segment
of a parsed placeholder expression.

name: resolveRecursively
desc: Recursively resolves the placeholder identified by key using the provided resolutionContext.

name: text
desc: Returns the raw textual representation of this part.

name: PlaceholderParsedSection
desc:
Represents a parsed section of a placeholder string,
typically extracted from a raw placeholder like #{key:default}.

name: PlaceholderParsedSection.new
desc:
Represents a parsed section of a placeholder string,
typically extracted from a raw placeholder like #{key:default}.

name: fallback
desc: The optional fallback value (e.g., MyApp).

name: key
desc: The placeholder key (e.g., app.name).

name: PlaceholderParsedValue
desc: A container for a parsed text and its constituent Part objects.

name: PlaceholderParsedValue.new
desc: A container for a parsed text and its constituent Part objects.

name: parts
desc: The parsed components (literal and placeholder parts) that make up the text.

name: resolve
desc: Resolves all parts into a single string using the provided resolutionContext.

name: text
desc: The original raw text, including unresolved placeholders.

name: PlaceholderParser
desc: A utility class for parsing and resolving placeholders within a string.

name: PlaceholderParser.new
desc: A utility class for parsing and resolving placeholders within a string.

name: parse
desc: Parses the given value into a PlaceholderParsedValue structure without resolving it.

name: replacePlaceholders
desc: Replaces all placeholders in the given value using the provided placeholderResolver.

name: PlaceholderPart
desc: Represents a segment or fragment of a placeholder expression.

name: resolve
desc: Represents a segment or fragment of a placeholder expression.

name: resolveAll
desc: Resolves and concatenates all parts using the given resolutionContext.

name: text
desc: Returns the raw textual representation of this part.

name: PlaceholderPartResolutionContext
desc:
A resolution context for placeholder expressions, providing configuration,
resolution logic, and tracking for visited placeholders.

name: PlaceholderPartResolutionContext.new
desc:
A resolution context for placeholder expressions, providing configuration,
resolution logic, and tracking for visited placeholders.

name: flagPlaceholderAsVisited
desc: Marks the given placeholder as visited to detect circular references.

name: handleUnresolvablePlaceholder
desc: Handles what to do when a placeholder cannot be resolved.

name: ignoreUnresolvablePlaceholders
desc: Whether to ignore unresolvable placeholders and leave them as-is.

name: logger
desc: Logger used for resolution tracing.

name: parse
desc: Parses the given text into a list of PlaceholderParts using the context’s parser.

name: parser
desc: A function that parses raw text into PlaceholderParts.

name: prefix
desc: The placeholder prefix (e.g. #{).

name: removePlaceholder
desc: Removes the given placeholder from the visited placeholders set.

name: resolvePlaceholder
desc: Strategy interface for resolving placeholder values in configuration strings.

name: resolver
desc: The underlying resolver used to resolve individual placeholder values.

name: suffix
desc: The placeholder suffix (e.g. }).

name: toPlaceholderText
desc:
Reconstructs a placeholder expression from the text using the context’s
prefix and suffix.

name: visitedPlaceholders
desc: Set of placeholders that have already been visited (for circular reference detection).

name: PlaceholderResolutionException
desc: Exception thrown when placeholder resolution fails.

name: PlaceholderResolutionException.new
desc: Creates an exception with a reason, placeholder, and optional value.

name: cause
desc: The underlying cause of this exception, if any.

name: getCause
desc: The cause of this exception, if any.

name: getMessage
desc: The message associated with this exception.

name: getStackTrace
desc: The stack trace associated with this exception.

name: message
desc: The message describing the error.

name: placeholder
desc: The placeholder that could not be resolved.

name: reason
desc: Reason for the failure.

name: stackTrace
desc: The associated stack trace.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: Resolution chain (e.g. key -> fallback -> default) that led to the error.

name: withValue
desc: Adds a parent resolution value to the chain and returns a new exception.

name: PlaceholderResolver
desc: Strategy interface for resolving placeholder values in configuration strings.

name: resolvePlaceholder
desc: Strategy interface for resolving placeholder values in configuration strings.

name: PlaceholderResolverExtension
desc: Extension to provide a method-style interface on PlaceholderResolverFn functions.

name: resolvePlaceholder
desc: Resolves the placeholder name using the underlying function.

name: PlaceholderTextPart
desc: A PlaceholderPart implementation that represents literal, already-resolved text within a placeholder expression.

name: PlaceholderTextPart.new
desc: A PlaceholderPart implementation that represents literal, already-resolved text within a placeholder expression.

name: resolve
desc: Represents a segment or fragment of a placeholder expression.

A utility class for resolving string values that contain placeholders
in the format #{name}.

name: PropertyPlaceholderHelper.more
desc:
A utility class for resolving string values that contain placeholders
in the format #{name}.

name: PropertyPlaceholderHelper.new
desc:
A utility class for resolving string values that contain placeholders
in the format #{name}.

name: parser
desc: The internal parser that handles placeholder resolution logic.

name: replacePlaceholders
desc: Replaces all #{name}-style placeholders in value using the given properties map.

name: replacePlaceholdersWithResolver
desc: Replaces all #{name}-style placeholders in value using a placeholderResolver.

name: SimplePlaceholderPart
desc: A PlaceholderPart that represents a basic placeholder expression with an optional fallback.

name: SimplePlaceholderPart.new
desc: A PlaceholderPart that represents a basic placeholder expression with an optional fallback.

name: fallback
desc: An optional fallback value to use if the placeholder cannot be resolved.

name: key
desc: The raw key of the placeholder (e.g., user in #{user}).

name: resolve
desc: Represents a segment or fragment of a placeholder expression.

name: StringUtils
desc: 🚀 StringUtils — A collection of common string manipulation utilities.

name: capitalize
desc: Capitalize first letter

name: cleanPath
desc: Clean path by normalizing separators and resolving . and ..

name: collectionToCommaDelimitedString
desc: Convert collection to comma delimited string

name: collectionToDelimitedString
desc: Convert collection to delimited string

name: commaDelimitedListToSet
desc: Convert comma delimited list to set

name: commaDelimitedListToStringList
desc: Convert comma delimited list to string array

name: containsWhitespace
desc: Check if a string contains whitespace

name: countOccurrencesOf
desc: Count occurrences of substring in string

name: delete
desc: Delete all occurrences of pattern

name: deleteAny
desc: Delete any character in charsToDelete

name: delimitedListToStringArray
desc: Convert delimited list to string array

name: endsWithIgnoreCase
desc: Test if string ends with suffix, ignoring case

name: getFilename
desc: Extract filename from path

name: getFilenameExtension
desc: Extract file extension from path

name: hasLength
desc: Check if a string has length

name: matchesCharacter
desc: Check if string matches character

name: quote
desc: Quote a string with single quotes

name: replace
desc: Replace all occurrences of oldPattern with newPattern

name: split
desc: Split string at first occurrence of delimiter

name: startsWithIgnoreCase
desc: Test if string starts with prefix, ignoring case

name: stripFilenameExtension
desc: Strip filename extension

name: tokenizeToStringArray
desc: Tokenizes a string into a list using multiple delimiters.

name: trimAllWhitespace
desc: Trim all whitespace from a string

name: trimLeadingCharacter
desc: Trim leading character from string

name: trimTrailingCharacter
desc: Trim trailing character from string

name: truncate
desc: Truncate string

name: uncapitalize
desc: Uncapitalize first letter

name: unqualify
desc: Unqualify a string by removing everything before the last dot
